description: This file serves as the entry point for a Flutter-based dictionary app. It initializes the app with a custom theme and renders the initial search page.

classes.name: DictionaryApp
classes.description: A root widget for the app that applies the Ocean Professional theme and builds the main MaterialApp.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The entry point that runs the DictionaryApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp with title, theme, and home page.
